original_title: Exposed: Nursing Narratives – racism & the pandemic
overview: ‘Exposed’ is a groundbreaking documentary that combines the stories of 19 Black, brown and migrant nurses and midwives to speak about their powerful experiences of racism before and during the pandemic. It was made as part of the Nursing Narratives – Racism and the Pandemic AHRC funded research project.
title: Exposed: Nursing Narratives – racism & the pandemic
